001package com.github.sormuras.bach.command;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Command;
004import java.io.File;
005import java.nio.file.Path;
006import java.util.List;
007import java.util.Optional;
008
009/**
010 * The javac command reads Java declarations and compiles them into class files.
011 *
012 * @param release Compile source code according to the rules of the Java programming language for
013 *     the specified Java SE release, generating class files which target that release.
014 * @param modules Compiles those source files in the named modules that are newer than the
015 *     corresponding files in the output directory.
016 * @param moduleSourcePathPatterns Specifies where to find source files when compiling code in
017 *     multiple modules: a module-pattern form, in which the source path for each module is
018 *     specified by a pattern.
019 * @param moduleSourcePathSpecifics Specifies where to find source files when compiling code in
020 *     multiple modules: a module-specific form, in which a package path is given for each module
021 *     containing code to be compiled.
022 * @param modulePathsOption Specifies where to find application modules.
023 * @param verbose Outputs messages about what the compiler is doing. Messages include information
024 *     about each class loaded and each source file compiled.
025 * @param outputDirectoryForClasses Specify where to place generated class files.
026 * @param additionals Aggregates additional command-line arguments.
027 */
028public record JavacCommand(
029    ReleaseOption release,
030    ModulesOption modules,
031    ModuleSourcePathPatternsOption moduleSourcePathPatterns,
032    ModuleSourcePathSpecificsOption moduleSourcePathSpecifics,
033    ModulePathsOption modulePathsOption,
034    VerboseOption verbose,
035    OutputDirectoryOption outputDirectoryForClasses,
036    AdditionalArgumentsOption additionals)
037    implements Command<JavacCommand> {
038
039  public JavacCommand() {
040    this(
041        ReleaseOption.empty(),
042        ModulesOption.empty(),
043        ModuleSourcePathPatternsOption.empty(),
044        ModuleSourcePathSpecificsOption.empty(),
045        ModulePathsOption.empty(),
046        VerboseOption.empty(),
047        OutputDirectoryOption.empty(),
048        AdditionalArgumentsOption.empty());
049  }
050
051  @Override
052  public String name() {
053    return "javac";
054  }
055
056  @Override
057  public JavacCommand option(Option option) {
058    return new JavacCommand(
059        option instanceof ReleaseOption release ? release : release,
060        option instanceof ModulesOption modules ? modules : modules,
061        option instanceof ModuleSourcePathPatternsOption paths ? paths : moduleSourcePathPatterns,
062        option instanceof ModuleSourcePathSpecificsOption paths ? paths : moduleSourcePathSpecifics,
063        option instanceof ModulePathsOption paths ? paths : modulePathsOption,
064        option instanceof VerboseOption verbose ? verbose : verbose,
065        option instanceof OutputDirectoryOption directory ? directory : outputDirectoryForClasses,
066        option instanceof AdditionalArgumentsOption additionals ? additionals : additionals);
067  }
068
069  public JavacCommand release(Integer release) {
070    return option(new ReleaseOption(Optional.ofNullable(release)));
071  }
072
073  public JavacCommand modules(String... modules) {
074    return modules(List.of(modules));
075  }
076
077  public JavacCommand modules(List<String> modules) {
078    return option(new ModulesOption(List.copyOf(modules)));
079  }
080
081  public JavacCommand moduleSourcePathPatterns(String... patterns) {
082    return option(new ModuleSourcePathPatternsOption(List.of(patterns)));
083  }
084
085  public JavacCommand moduleSourcePathAddPattern(String segment) {
086    return option(moduleSourcePathPatterns.add(segment));
087  }
088
089  public JavacCommand moduleSourcePathAddSpecific(String module, Path path, Path... more) {
090    return option(moduleSourcePathSpecifics.withModuleSpecificForm(module, path, more));
091  }
092
093  public JavacCommand modulePaths(Path... paths) {
094    return option(new ModulePathsOption(List.of(paths)));
095  }
096
097  public JavacCommand modulePathsAdd(Path path, Path... more) {
098    return option(modulePathsOption.add(path, more));
099  }
100
101  public JavacCommand verbose(Boolean verbose) {
102    return option(new VerboseOption(Optional.ofNullable(verbose)));
103  }
104
105  public JavacCommand outputDirectoryForClasses(Path path) {
106    return option(new OutputDirectoryOption(Optional.ofNullable(path)));
107  }
108
109  @Override
110  public JavacCommand additionals(AdditionalArgumentsOption additionals) {
111    return option(additionals);
112  }
113
114  @Override
115  public List<String> toArguments() {
116    var javac = Command.of(name());
117    if (release.isPresent()) javac = javac.add("--release", release.get());
118    if (modules.isPresent()) javac = javac.add("--module", modules.join(","));
119    if (moduleSourcePathPatterns.isPresent()) {
120      javac = javac.add("--module-source-path", moduleSourcePathPatterns.join());
121    }
122    for (var specific : moduleSourcePathSpecifics.values()) {
123      javac = javac.add("--module-source-path", specific);
124    }
125    if (modulePathsOption.isPresent()) {
126      javac = javac.add("--module-path", modulePathsOption.join(File.pathSeparator));
127    }
128    if (verbose.isTrue()) javac = javac.add("-verbose");
129    if (outputDirectoryForClasses.isPresent()) {
130      javac = javac.add("-d", outputDirectoryForClasses.get());
131    }
132    //
133    javac = javac.addAll(additionals.values());
134    //
135    return javac.toArguments();
136  }
137
138  /** Java SE release feature version option. */
139  public record ReleaseOption(Optional<Integer> value) implements Option.Value<Integer> {
140    public static ReleaseOption empty() {
141      return new ReleaseOption(Optional.empty());
142    }
143  }
144}
